com.magknight.mathutils

Class Line2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.mathutils.Line2D

  • public class Line2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a line in the form r = r0 +td Where r is the line, r0 is an arbitrary point on the line, t is a constant and d is a directional unit vector. Also provides various useful calculations and algorithms for 2d cartesian lines.
    Author:
    Omar Alam and Cian Mc Sweeney

    • Method Detail

      • lineWithTwoPoints

        public static Line2D lineWithTwoPoints(Vector2 firstPoint,
                                       Vector2 secondPoint)
        Returns a Line2D defined by two points. Using this method will automatically calculate the direction vector between the two points and uses firstPoint as the origin of the line
        Parameters:
        firstPoint - First point on the line
        secondPoint - Second point on the line
        Returns:
        Line2D

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getPointAtDistance

        public Vector2 getPointAtDistance(double distance)
        For use with the map projection system. Returns a point at a specific distance from the origin point.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance in meters
        Returns:
        Vector2 point at specified distance.
        See Also:
        Projection

      • pointExists

        Checks if a given point exists on the line.
        Parameters:
        point - point to check
        Returns:
        boolean true if point exists, false otherwise.

        public Line2D getPerpendicular(TurnDirection directionOfPerpendicular)

        Returns:

      • getPerpendicular

        public Line2D getPerpendicular(Vector2 origin,
                               TurnDirection directionOfPerpendicular)
        Get a perpendicular line to the current line with a different origin point.
        Parameters:
        origin - new origin point
        directionOfPerpendicular - perpendicular line orientation (LEFT OR RIGHT)
        Returns:
        Line2D perpendicular line with specified orientation and origin
        See Also:
        getPerpendicular(TurnDirection)

                          TurnDirection locationOfParallel)
        Calculate a parallel line to the current line with a specified distance and relative location (LEFT or RIGHT)
        Parameters:

        locationOfParallel - relative location (LEFT or RIGHT)
        Returns:
        Line2D parallel line with specified distance and location.

      • directionRelativeToLine

        public TurnDirection directionRelativeToLine(Vector2 point)
        Returns which side of the line a point lies relative to the lines direction vector
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TurnDirection side of the line on which the point lies.

      • pointAtDirection

        public Vector2 pointAtDirection(Vector2[] points,
                                TurnDirection direction)
        Selects the point that lies on the specified side of the Line. Chooses the first point if both points are on the same side.
        Parameters:
        points - Vector2[] with 2 points.
        direction - TurnDirection turn direction to choose point from.
        Returns:
        Vector2 point chosen on the specified side of the line.
